net.maritimecloud.mms

Interface BroadcastSubscription


  • public interface BroadcastSubscription
    A broadcast subscription is created every time a BroadcastListener is registered via MmsClient.broadcastListen(Class, BroadcastListener) or MmsClient.broadcastListen(Class, BroadcastListener, net.maritimecloud.util.geometry.Area).

    Sometimes registering a

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel()
      Stops receiving any more broadcast messages for the registered listener.
      Area getArea()
      Returns the area for which the client is listening for broadcast.
      Class<? extends BroadcastMessage> getBroadcastMessageType()
      Returns the type of broadcast message we are listening for.
      long getNumberOfReceivedMessages()
      Returns the number of broadcast messages received by the registered listener.

    • Method Detail

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        Stops receiving any more broadcast messages for the registered listener.

      • getArea

        Area getArea()
        Returns the area for which the client is listening for broadcast. If this client is used on board a ship the returned area will change whenever the ships position is updated.
        Returns:
        the area for which the client is listening for broadcast.

      • getBroadcastMessageType

        Class<? extends BroadcastMessage> getBroadcastMessageType()
        Returns the type of broadcast message we are listening for.
        Returns:
        the type of broadcast message we are listening for

      • getNumberOfReceivedMessages

        long getNumberOfReceivedMessages()
        Returns the number of broadcast messages received by the registered listener.
        Returns:
        the number of messages received
